level.heading: Accountability for funds received.
level.text: The District of Columbia Board of Education shall account for all funds received pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of sections, see §§ 2 and 3 of the (D.C. Act 19-408, July 24, 2012, 59 DCR 9130).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-221, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-1001.
